4.7F9

MDB AUTOMATIC SPOUT INSERTER MACHINES

MDB MACHINE
NUMBER

RESPONSIBILTY

DAYTIME OPERATOR

WEEKLY

MONTHLY

MONTH

ITEM

Angle Cutter

Air Tank

Air Reticulation

Teflon (Sealing & Cooling
Surfaces)

Conveyor Belt

Pouch Picking Device

Pouch Feed Device

Spout Feed Device

First Sealer

Second Sealer

Cooling Sealer

•
•
•

•
•
•

Hygiene Clearance Record: Please tick under clearance done where applicable. Compulsory to do clearance for all maintenance preformed.
Any maintenance performed must be documented on table below checklist.
Please ensure all temporary repairs corrections (if applicable) are documented on Temporary Repairs Table below
Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers, Rubber Roller,
and Punches & Packing Table.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new one.
If a cloth is torn or damaged please ensure that the piece that is torn off is discarded together with the damaged cloth and issue new cloth immediately
Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.

Controlled Copy

Hygiene Clearance Record: Please tick under clearance done where applicable. Compulsory to do clearance for all maintenance preformed.
Any maintenance performed must be documented on table below checklist.
Please ensure all temporary repairs corrections (if applicable) are documented on Temporary Repairs Table below
Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers, Rubber Roller,
and Punches & Packing Table.

Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.

MDB MACHINE

RESPONSIBILTY

DAYTIME OPERATOR

All temporary repairs must be corrected within 14 days of “Temporary Repair” Maintenance Job Card being opened.
Complete table below together with “Temporary Repair” Maintenance Job Card including the post maintenance hygiene clearance being done.

“Temporary Repair”
Maintenance Job Card Number

Date of “Temporary Repair”
Maintenance Job Card

Date of Temporary Repair
Correction

Initial

Completed by:

Initial as per Organogram

Hygiene Clearance Record: Please tick under clearance done where applicable. Compulsory to do clearance for all maintenance preformed.
Any maintenance performed must be documented on table below checklist.

Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers, Rubber Roller,
and Punches & Packing Table.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new one.

Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.

Any maintenance performed must be documented on table below checklist.

Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers, Rubber Roller,
and Punches & Packing Table.
